references: W. H. Mills and R. C. Mullin, Coverings and packings, pp. 371-399 of J. H. Dinitz and D. R. Stinson, editors,a Contemporary Design Theory, Wiley, 1992. See Eq. 1.
maple: L := proc(v,k,t,l) local i,t1; t1 := l; for i from v-t+1 to v do t1 := ceil(t1*i/(i-(v-k))); od: t1; end; # gives Schoenheim bound L_l(v,k,t). Current sequence is L_1(n,4,3,1).
crossrefs: Lower bound to A011979. Cf. A011975.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 11 2002
